video.title: Course Logistics
video.msg: Lesson Provider: William Eustis We discuss course logistics, grading, and course content in this lesson. No homeworks/MPs yet, so no due dates coming up. Have a great beginning of your semester, I-L-L!

video.title: What is Rust (The Programming Language)? - CS 128 Honors Lecture 1
video.msg: CS 128 Honors is the Honors Add-on course for CS 128 at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign. This course teaches Rust, with a focus on topics such as concurrency, thread safety, functional programming, and how Rust does OOP.
